issue.title: [R] Update as.Date() to support an origin different from epoch
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15799](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15799). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
At present there are (at least) 2 possible directions:
- support an origin option in the C++ code - ARROW-15798
- support it only in the R code (once we can do arithmetic with dates and durations) - ARROW-14947 or ARROW-11090
